Comments_List: I learned the methodology behind neighborhood effects and neighborhoods and crime. I really feel like I gained an excellent introduction to this field. I also feel more broadly that I have a gained a great deal of insight into different ways to think about social science more broadly.
How to be a better sociologist.
This class provides an in-depth overview of not only neighborhood literature but a survey of urban sociology

strength of the course was that it was a relaxed space, which made it amenable to "real life" conversations about how the material we were learning applied to the world around us. it made the class entertaining and feel useful. that said, a lot of the same (male) voices dominated the conversation.
Absolutely! excellent course with a great professor.
